2014.headline: Huge effort in Burkina!
2014.part1: Burkina Faso, one of the poorest countries receives funding and help from the ODI World Bank Project to kick start the Open Data effort in the country
2014.part2: In 2014, data.gov.bf is launched containing 64 datasets on health and education and the first demo app is built.

2014.headline: UK drops 76 places!
2014.part1: The UK leads the way in 2013.
2014.part2: However in 2014, some datasets drop in support as the UK tries to find more value from Open Data.
